# 38th Golden Bell Awards

The 38th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第38屆金鐘獎) was held on November 5, 2003, at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by EBC.
